title: Governance Policy Definition Schema (PDS)
description: Canonical JSON schema for all rules stored in the GRS, ensuring machine-readable, unambiguous policy definitions (S-03 inputs).

policyId.description: Unique cryptographic ID for the policy rule.

ruleType.description: Category of the constraint (e.g., Safety Veto, Resource Limit Constraint).

targetComponent.description: The component ID the rule primarily targets or enforces integrity over (e.g., GRS, C-11, AIA).

severity.description: Severity level, 5 being an irreversible VETO.
